website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for a multiple cat household, this jumbo size litter mat will trap most litter before it can be tracked.
pros: Large enough to accommodate two litter boxes
Versatile design, can also be a water mat or bird cage liner
cons: Litter difficult to extract from fibers
Tighter weave does not capture as much litter as other models

customer_reviews.title: Giant litter catcher.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these gigantic mats and slightly overlapped them so I could put them in a corner with four boxes on them. Catches all the litter and fallen turds that don't make it into the box. Haven't had to deal with pee so far, but I'm sure it would not be an issue. I use a brushless vacuum on it daily after scooping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R. Cornett

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE LITTER MESS
customer_reviews.text: I am a 3 cat household. It feels like I am constantly cleaning kitty litter off the floor around the litter boxes. But with this new litter mat the litter is contained to one area which makes daily clean up so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: It's ginormous! I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I expected, but I'm so happy with the size and price. It catches about 95% of the litter my cats track out.
customer_reviews.author: stacyg

customer_reviews.title: Best litter mat ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Was a little hesitant because of the price but I'm so glad I bought it. I've had cats my whole life and have tried every litter mat under the sun. Works so well. The cats don't try to jump over it like some of the previous ones. Super soft and slip resistant. You have to shake the heck out of it to clean it because it really does trap the litter inside it. But totally fine with that. It even survives all the cat scratching without looking ragged. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: DON'T RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these. I never got two of them out. The two I DO have down are pretty much impossible to clean well because the litter gets trapped in crevices and I bought the giant ones, because I needed that, so, it's hard to get out of the house to hose down without dribbling everywhere on the way. In summation. These are a pain in the butt and I do not recommend. Don't regret trying them, though. Have to try things, don't you? But, I'm going to make one trip to get them out and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: at first seemed great but once my cat started using it
customer_reviews.text: at first seemed great but once my cat started using it, the material is almost like a screen and the little gets underneath and you can't get it out so it looks filthy. very dissatisfied. can't seem to get a mat that works.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: So I read all the reviews and saw elsewhere that this is the best map to trap litter. I dont know if I have supper cats but even when I covered a huge area with 2 jumbo pads and 4 smaller sizes, my cats are still tracking. I dont understanding why its not catching all the litter, it catches the litter when my cats immediately come out of the litter boxes but I find tracking off the mats. It may work for you but I have been struggling with this a long time and havent found a solution yet. I hoped my search ended here, but the search goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Finally effective litter control
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a small fortune trying to find something to keep the litter fall out from finding its way all over the room. I have 3 cats and 4 boxes. I have tried lids, mats and more mats and lids. These new mats are big enough to catch it all and they look so much better than those noisy bright colored and or stripped ones I have been buying. It catches the litter but does not irritate their paws. In fact one of my boys thinks it is a bed :( what can I say he is very pretty so he doesn't need smarts :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large track mat and is great quality. I used for a week about was very impressed. However, it's not water proof. My trouble cat peed on it several times apparently and it sank through to my hard wood floors. I cleaned the litter boxes twice that week and didn't see pee - nor smell it, so it does a great job at masking urine, but look underneath it if you have a problem fur baby that prefers the floor to a box. I washed it outside with soap and water hose and it held up great. So it's VERY good quality, helps hold stray litter pieces, masks urine smell, but not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: The worse part is you may not notice there’s accident and ...
customer_reviews.text: Other then the size, this mat is not ideal for cats tends to have accidents. It didn’t say anywhere in the description but this mat is NOT WATERPROOF! Urine and small particles will go through the mat and mess up the floor. The worse part is you may not notice there’s accident and the urine will be trapped underneath for some period of time. I purchased this mat about one month ago. I just decided today that I am going to trash it and get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Chen

customer_reviews.title: Gentle for paws & bare feet, excellent for tracking litter, great size
customer_reviews.text: These are soft- as opposed to the hard rubber mats I'd bought from a local store- which means the kittens do not mind walking on it and don't try to jump over it. It holds litter (spilled or tracked out) very well. The size guarantees our kits have to walk on it far enough that any litter in their paws remains on the mat as well as any litter kicked out during fervent burying/digging does not leave the area. These are easy enough to clean if I fold it up, take it outside, and shake it a few times. I'd cover my floors (i.e. the entire house) with these if it was cost effective!
customer_reviews.author: CelticElff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to catch everything!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have the weird habit of jumping out of the liter box from all sides, which means their litter (which is similar to grains of sand) gets everywhere! Most litter mats are a size which would make them good if your kitties only come out of the front of the litter box. This mat is nice and big so it goes all around the box and catches everything. Now I just have to vacuum the mat to get it all cleaned up. My girls don't pee outside the litter but it does seem water resistant. And the bottom of it has some grip so it doesn't slide all over. This has definitely helped my house stayed cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Cats are Jerks
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several things to prevent tracking. Unfortunately, our cats like to avoid using any of them, and try to jump over everything instead of putting their poor, delicate paws on anything... Jerks... Anyway, this has been the best option so far. They still track litter, but this has been the closest contender. It's not the most comfortable for bare human feet, but that's not the point. The real point is that cats are jerks. :-)
customer_reviews.author: bathtub-gin

customer_reviews.title: Don't over think it, just buy it...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cat-box mat I've ever bought! Combined with the dome shaped litter box I have, our cat is one happy camper, and so am I. It's a breeze to clean, I just run my vacuum over it, and it traps and holds litter very well. The size is perfect, it's huge, with plenty of room for a jumbo sized cat box, and space for my cat to walk around on it and collect the litter of his paws. Also, bonus, it doesn't smell like nasty plastic and isn't waaaay over packaged with plastic and wasteful packaging. Great product, I wish I would have just bought this one first and saved myself some money...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also a doormat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a front door mat. I wanted something to really catch the dirt when I bring my dog in from her walk. This really does help a LOT. I used a regular carpet vacuum and it cleaned up well. I haven't had to wash it yet, but it seems like it would wash up well with the hose outside. It is lightweight, but lays flat on the floor well. It does not roll up or skid. It feels cool to the feet and my dog seems to like to lie on it to rest too. I bought the extra large one and I'm so glad I did. I am considering this for the other door too.
customer_reviews.author: Lapage Jo

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs odors permanently and hard to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs odors terribly! Poop and urine smells can't be washed out, as well of the smells of any cleaners you use on it being permanent. Also difficult to clean. In trying to wash mine in the bathtub, my finger put a hole in it. I didn't realize it and the next time my cat peed on the mat, it went through to my carpet and traveled along the length of the whole mat. It does hold the litter well, but I ended up having to throw it out. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for two litter boxes. Cat litter thrown out of the box or dragged out by the box by the cats falls through the looped pile and down to the mat surface, where it's no longer tracked around the house if you walk on the mat. Heavy-duty, thick, and stays flat with no need to hold down the mat edges. I've tried to work with lower quality products and improvise with rugs and other mats, but this mat was definitely worth the investment. It does feel a bit strange to walk on barefoot, but I don't consider that to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Suparmanto

customer_reviews.title: In my original post (Nov2016) I said it did not do any better than the old rug we were using
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to handle 3 cats who I think have made a compatation out of the three litter boxes. In my original post (Nov2016) I said it did not do any better than the old rug we were using. To date, it is better. It does collect more litter fragments off their paws than a rug. Still not thrilled about the amount of litter on the floor, but it has been decreased. I'll go 3.5 Stars now
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Large is plenty.
customer_reviews.text: So thinking that large might be too small I ordered the jumbo. Jumbo is right, huge!! But it’s doing it’s job. I got the beige since my carpet is beige, but the mat is more like a creme foundation shade. So it didn’t blend in as well as I would like. This traps the small sand like litter really well, but I’ve since switched to the larger size litter and it does not trap it as well. The cat didn’t seem to mind the change which I was worried about. Overall, the value for the money is good. Color just lighter than in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Grrlnexdoor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several mats in stores, however they were too small. This is the largest mat I can find. It is great quality and really holds onto the litter, keeping it (mostly) off of our feet. Our cat also likes to sharpen her claws on it when stretching. It can take it! Not once have her claws torn up the mat! I love it! I am thing about order it for our shower mat, as it is soft and perfect for a shower mat. I would recommend this mat to anyone who has a cat!
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Traps the litter so your kitty isn't bitter
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase even though they are a tad larger than I expected. I got two and while it's great to put 2 litter boxes side by side...the other lone litter box is sitting on this huge mat whereas I should have gone down a size. Otherwise, they catch the litter perfectly and traps the granules from traveling so easily throughout my house. These litter boxes are located in our garage, but as cat owners know...the litter gets in kitty paws and travels with your furbaby. Not so much now that we have these. I don't even has as much sweeping up in the garage now! Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle by Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat. Not Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size and has a nice, deep "plush" to help my cats clean their paws and trap little. The only thing I would add to all the other 5 star reviews is my caution that this mat is not waterproof. I had this on carpet and one of my cats has trouble keeping her pee inside the litter box. (Insists on backing up against the side.) We recently pulled up the mat to relocate it and found a nasty wet stain on the bottom of the mat and on the carpet. Thankfully Shout carpet cleaner took care of the problem, but now I put this mat on top of an old plastic chair pad.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Hole tore right through after few days.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible mat. Holes RIP easily in it . And I don't have cats that scratch and tear things. I have leather couch and no scratches on it. My cats dont claw things..There is no thicker backing like the smaller ones they sell in the local pet stores. The mat did smell for few days we aired it out. Huge waste of money. Huuge
customer_reviews.author: Eash

customer_reviews.title: Assess your needs and read the question and answers and reviews before buying.
customer_reviews.text: It depends on what your need is. If it is to just stop the litter from getting all over, it does a great job. If however, you have a cat that sometimes misses the littler pan, it is not water proof. The urine will go through to your floor or carpet. I just refinished my hardwood floor in the den and it is not stained. I did not go to the questions and answers like I normally do. I am so frustrated. I have an old cat whose eye sight is getting bad and thought this was the answer. Nope.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Big, sturdy and works well to reduce litter tracking
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this mat. It is the largest that I have been able to locate. It's heavy enough that it doesn't move around on a tile floor (the rubber backing helps, too) but not so large or heavy that I can't pick it up to take outside for cleaning and/or washing. The loops do catch the litter, but they vacuum up for the most part--at least the litter pieces that remain near the surface. It does require some shaking out to remove litter particles that collect further down in the loops. I like that I can wash it with a garden hose if needed or just shake it out to remove the deeper-down litter particles.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shotts

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Very large w/plenty of room for my cat to jump out of his box and still be able to walk a few steps and get his feet cleaned off. This has made a tremendous difference. Finally my kitty has clean feet again. Certain cats like to really kick around the litter when in the litter box and my cat is one of them. He’d exit with his back paws covered in litter and it really sticks to the bottom but with this mat, it pulls the litter off just by walking on the mat
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this mat!
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter mat is the best I have ever purchased!! This mat covers a large area, catches litter scatter, my cats don't jump over it when exiting their boxes like they did with other mats, it is very easy to clean & was shipped and delivered quickly. I had purchased the smaller sized mat 2 years ago & just barely had to replace it. They are very durable & don't have any strange odor!! I will definitely continue to purchase these mats in the future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sibert

customer_reviews.title: Best mat ever, very good quality and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Best litter mat! It is the third mat I have even bought from different brands. I am not satisfied with the first two, but I love this one. First, it is much more sturdy and thicker which seems very good quality. I used vacuum on it and it is strong enough that it will not been sucked into the vacuum. Cleanup is easy. Second, it lays flat on the ground and looks nice. Third, it doesn’t have strong odor that only smells a little odor when I opened the package. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats and their litter boxes are located side by side like in this photo. One of the cats, the female, had a tendency to pee outside her box on the mat that was there. She didn't like it for some reason. I ordered this Jumbo mat to fit under both cats' boxes and it fit perfectly and is working very well. It's been a week, and so far no trace of urine outside the box. Success! It's a nice, sturdy mat and easy to clean. I just sweep the loose litter into a mini dustpan. Very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I like these mats a lot. I bought 2 to put under 2 different litter robots that I have downstairs on laminate floor/tile. The mats really do trap a lot of litter and there is less tracking. My only complaint is that because the material is some kind of rubber it's hard to vacuum up the litter that gets trapped in the grooves, and because the mats are so large I'm not going to roll them up and take them outside to shake off every day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size mat!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and 2 litter boxes. One of my cats is big and he prefers an open litter box, but that means he throws litter everywhere! This mat is large enough for both boxes with enough space around and in front of them to trap any stray litter. I had one like this before, but it was too small and I ended up getting rid of it. It is easy to shake out, but can be hosed off or even washed...just not dried in the dryer. It dries quickly when I hang it outside. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Rose

customer_reviews.title: Catces kitty liter great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review. I ordered two of these mats. They catch the liter great. My kitty does poop Outside her liter box occasionally. I’m glad I have two of these for that reason. If one gets Dirty it goes outside to be washed off and dry, the second clean one goes down in the meantime. They Are of a really great quality, thick material. Imagine they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hilts

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE and just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for me. I adopted two orphaned kittens and we went from a regular litter box to one of those large plastic storage containers for their litter because they LOVE to play in it. My only problem is that, because it was folded up to ship, I can't get it to lay completely flat. Obviously, this isn't the end of the world. It's staying in the basement and no one is going to judge me. I just wish I could get the folds out.
customer_reviews.author: BKings

customer_reviews.title: It's good but I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.text: I have four cats and it worked for maybe a little over a month. It did good at catching the litter but it is very hard to clean. The one I ordered came to me stained which isn't that big of a deal but it had this large black stain in the middle of it. One of my cats throw up on it and the stain never came out even though I cleaned it right away. I wouldn't buy it again. Eventually I had to throw it away due to how difficult it was to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: ...it retains liquid. I have two senior cats and they have a hard time getting in-to the litter boxes. So they always have an accident partially on the mat. When trying to wash it, it takes an act of got to get the odor out and takes for ever to sun dry because of the material. Still using it, but with a puppy mat under it so the pee won't get to the mat. Great for reducing litter traction.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing. For the first time ever, I have noticed a lot less litter on my floors! The rubber backing keeps this mat in place and the litter is not visible since it settles down inside the mat. All I have to do is shake it once in awhile. From the picture, it looked like a regular carpet like mat but it is much more. It has nooks and crannies to completely catch most of the cat litter my cats get onto their paws. Love this mat! It is worth the extra price for something that is so different from all other mats. Get it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works but ultra-flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Rating down to 3 stars after further use. This mat does exactly what it was designed to do, but it is made of some very flimsy material. This was obvious after the first time I took it outside to shake off the litter that had collected on it. After a couple of brisk shakes, the mat literally started ripping apart where my hands were holding it. It is still useable for now, but pretty disappointed on the quality and I don't expect it to last very long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A.

customer_reviews.title: Omg thank god I was able to return it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg thank god I was able to return it!! Litter a nightmare after day 2 and even vacuuming couldn't get it out!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandpiper

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, Large and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I got this mat to protect my hardwood floors from puppy accidents. I wanted something that looked nice and didn't move around easily. I've been able to vacuum right over it with ease. It's a great large size and fits the enclosure perfectly. Time will tell if this product works for our particular needs. Update: It's certianly working as intended to protect the hardwoods from puppy accidents, however she does like to shred the mat on occasion by biting at the "fibers". Now it's not as pretty, but still functional. I can see this could also be an issue if you have a kitty that likes to claw at things.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.Smith

customer_reviews.title: My cats preferred to just poop and pee on the mat
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea,... but litter granules get caught all up in it,.... and I dunno why but as soon as I put this down my cats quit using the litter box and just started pooping and peeing all on this thing instead,... poop was easy to clean off of it,... but pee is a nightmare, have to basically hose it down,.... after two days of massive pooping and peeing on it I just threw it away and my cats have started going back to the litter box thank god!
customer_reviews.author: Doyle

customer_reviews.title: These work really well!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have 3 of these. I use them at the patio door, the front door and under the litter box. They catch dirt and pebbles etc and keep it on the rug because of the design of the tread.. I also had one previously that worked well for under the rabbit hutch, the rug took the brunt of the ammonia and urine stains while the wood floor did not show any wear under it. The floors remain intact and the rug is easy clean, meaning take it outside rinse with a hose and let dry.... definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: brandeebelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats of which one I swear takes paws full of litter and tracks it everywhere. This has reduced the tracking by 99%. Because of size it is a little cumbersome picking it up and putting litter back in litter pan but vacuuming works well. I would give 5 stars except color. I thought I was ordering a color that is close to the color of litter but it is pretty dark gray and so you can see the litter on the mat which can be unattractive if. Or cleaning it up daily. But I rather not have litter in my kitchen vs laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: D. Leaman

customer_reviews.title: Human and feline approval
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the regular size one first and liked that one so much I had to get the JUMBO. As another reviewer stated, I also rolled up the edges against the wall to contain all the little litter pellets. Although made of PVC, it is woven intertwined threads, quite soft, and the squiggles do catch the escaping litter. I find it easy to clean, with vacuum or brush daily, and once a week complete shake out. This measures 47.2 by 36 inches and weighs 5 1/2 pounds. Register the product on their website and they e-mail a coupon code for $5 off your next purchase! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: The Queen of Lakeshore

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain all the litter mess
customer_reviews.text: This mat is sturdy and well made but I gave it 4 starts because I honestly believed that it would contain all the litter mess. Now it does contain 90% of the mess and I did not get a small mat. I got a large mat so my kitty had to walk across it before leaving the area and still there is kitty litter every where. So I am a little disappointed that I have to clean litter up from the floor that the mat did not contain. But does take care a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lita

customer_reviews.title: but has done an excellent (not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This mat exceeded my expectations! It's very very jumbo sized as it says, but has done an excellent (not perfect, there will never be perfect) job of catching those stray litter! I use world's best for my cats and it's done a great job catching the fly away's from their little paws! I ordered in the beige as normally I'd order grey and was very pleased with this neutral color!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Briceba

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this mat was a bit pricey, but I bought it because I was tired of sweeping and vacuuming cat litter that tracked onto the smaller mat and then onto the floor. This mat is a nice adequate size. It lies flat and is not so thick that it gets in the way of opening the door. It is easy to vacuum. and if it lasts, it will be well worth the money. I also bought the Catit litter box and now our kitty doesn't kick out the littler like she did with the other box. Life has become simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Homebody

customer_reviews.title: Most Effective Litter Mat We've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: As a cat owner (that can't be right, but moving on) of 50 years, litter mats have come and gone. Easyology is here to stay. The material is soft on their paws, and the design traps the litter before they can track it through the house. When I clean their area, I just shake the pad gently to clean it for use again. Best ever!
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further -- This Is The Mat You Need
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a game-changer, if you have multiple cats. Because we rescued a family of kitties (& found we couldn't split them up) we now have 7. Clean cat litter is a MUST, but so is the area around it. This mat easily allows 2 litter boxes, w/plenty of room for scratching & pawing afterward. The 3 colors make it simple to fit in w/any decor. I even use one for FEEDING, because my little ones don't have the best table manners! I HIGHLY recommend this product & will be back for more as needed. And thank you for the speedy service & the 15% off coupon! Great company!! Superior product!
customer_reviews.author: Cuz I'm the Mom

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.  NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised at the weight and size of this mat. It's awesome! Completely fills the space that I keep one of the litter boxes in. Normally I have to deal with litter being tracked out of that room regardless of the type or # of mats I use. With this one though, there hasn't been a single litter trail to clean up outside of the room since I laid it down. Buy this mat. It's the last one you'll ever need and the best one you'll ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: The previous mat I had, did OK with collecting litter off kitty feet, but it was small, and my two cats decided they needed to play with the mat because it was light weight, scattering the captured litter everywhere as they played with it. This mat does a great job of capturing the litter off their feet and is heavy enough that it's not part of their toy collection.
customer_reviews.author: T Rock

customer_reviews.title: Keeps most of the mess down
customer_reviews.text: This does contain 90% of my cats litter and thats good enough for me. A lot of cats will fly out of the litter box like a maniac and sometimes I doubt my cats paws even touch down on this large mat so I understand there will be some litter, sometimes more than other times. Thats my cats fault, not the mats. The mat does come clean good with vacuum though. Minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Mat does its job!
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a smaller litter trapping mat around our litter box and it did a good job, but I wanted something bigger! We have a cat that digs for gold every time she goes in the litter box, which means litter all over the place! This mat is big enough that it catches the majority of the litter from the little monster. I vacuum up the litter about once a week and disinfect the mat once a month when I do the box.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Really Traps Iitter Well.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this mat. It works. I have three cats. This one is so large that two regular sized boxes fit on it. I also like the beige color because the litter that is trapped it less noticeable. I have this one on a carpet and I love that the mat is so large and seems water proof. I have bought another smaller one and plan to buy another one so that all my boxes have one. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's good. My cat's claws don't get stuck in it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good. My cat's claws don't get stuck in it while scratching around after using the litter box. I hardly see any litter tracked around the house anymore... we use Cedariffic which is awesome but easily tracked. Only thing is I'm not sure if it is breathable as we have it on a basement floor (not sure if water resistant means it is still breathable or not). Either way, it's been several months now and it is staying dry and mildew smell free underneath.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Jumbo Cat Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat easily holds two litter boxes, looks exactly as pictured and is soft to the touch. I cannot attest to how well it works as I have had it less than a week. I hope it will hold in the litter and wash easily as advertised. To be honest I am filling this out as it is the third request in less than a week and I want the emails to stop. If it works as advertised I would easily give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I am a skeptic of most things and purchased this mat fully expecting to return it eventually. But I could not be happier with this mat!!!! It truly does what it is advertised to do. I have noticed a considerable reduction in kitty litter being tracked around the house. In fact I would say it prevents 99% of it. And the company's promise to donate to animal shelters is all the more reason to buy it. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Attention: Multi-> ^..^< households !
customer_reviews.text: The 'jumbo' IS the perfect size. I have a lot of cats and use a big 31x15 storage containers for litter boxes. Smaller boxes are more work for me and less 'inviting' for my cats who eschew any box with a lid or wherein they can't turn around & happily dig. My cats are happy with the feel of the mat and I'm happiER now that I'm not constantly sweeping up litter.
customer_reviews.author: barbara myers

customer_reviews.title: handsome mat does the job
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a great variety of mats and such to put under the litter boxes, with more or less success. But the cats were still tracking out little gritty bits of litter which, when stepped on with bare feet, were annoying. They were quite suspicious of this fabric-like mat at first and tried to step only on the edges of it to get inside the litter box. They seem to be adjusting to it and it looks good, looks better than any of the predecessor solutions we had tried, and is cutting down on the gritty bits that were tracked out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I will change it if we change our minds, but at least after the first week, this mat is a big success for us and our three cats, It keeps the tracked litter to a more limited area, it is much easier to wash than our old one, and one mat fits both litter boxes on top of it. It didn't even have a weird rubber chemical smell when I first got it out. That was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: This One Works
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this mat for a week, but so far I can see a tremendous difference in how much litter I have to sweep up around it. I think that's in part because it's so much larger than the previous mat, but I believe it's also because of the deep rectangular frame of the puffy extruded PVC material an inch inside the edge of the mat. That edge holds any sloughed off litter ON the mat instead of it being flicked onto the floor. Plus, it's pretty!
customer_reviews.author: cpmanley

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for messy cat
customer_reviews.text: I love my cat, he's my sweet fuzzy son, but he's also a certified slob on the litter box. Even with a litter box with a lid he still manages to flick litter all over the floor! The smaller mat I had just wasn't cutting it, but this size is great for multiple cats or messy cats. (My other cat is a very neat girl, but she has no interest in sharing her good litter manners with her brother so this mat was a necessity!) Shipped quickly and I really have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JenBen

customer_reviews.title: This Mat is the Solution
customer_reviews.text: Buddy is a very rambunctious litter user. Even with the high sided litter box he still manages to get litter outside the box. Perhaps it’s stuck to his paws, however, whatever the cause this mat is the solution. It’s really quite amazing! The mat stays in place, is easy to take outside to shake and can even be vacuumed. Me and Buddy highly recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: B. McConn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Litter Boxes
customer_reviews.text: This is really big, so make sure you have the space, but it was perfect for my needs - well addition to the others I use to cover my bathroom floor to try to keep litter from going elsewhere. It's a little tricky to clean the few times a kitty has gotten sick on it...but that is also because I don't really have easy option to hose it down.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job containing cat litter
customer_reviews.text: This mat surprised me. The design is such that the littler collects in the smooth lines between the pads, making it easy to vacuum up the litter. This pad does a good job of keeping the litter on the pad and off the floor. While the pattern is aesthetically pleasing, it is also practical.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service and Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and we love the jumbo size cat litter mat. We have had a similar product before that just didn't cut it. When looking at the Easyology litter mat there appeared to be a couple of small differences between this and our previous product. Those small differences are big differences to our cats! Highly recommend Easyology and their litter mat. Also, the Easyology service has been exceptional as they have checked with us twice to make sure we were satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It`s the largest size of the mat I could find and it`s great even for only one cat! I had a small one from Walmart, but the litter would fall out on the carpet (I use an uncovered litter box) because her burying process is a long one and the mat wasn`t big enough... I really liked that the seller reached out with a special email thanking for the purchase and ensuring I was 100% happy with the purchase. You also get to register the product for lifetime warranty and you get $5 off next purchase. They also make a small donation to local animal shelters for each Amazon review :) Overall I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kb101

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This mat is difficult to clean. I have tried shaking it out, a broom, a stick vac, and a regular carpet vacuum with the hose. It's a pain in the you-know-what to clean this. Definitely not what I was expecting. I thought it was solid with just the design, but it actually has a texture with a bunch of loops (reminds me of ramen noodles before they're cooked) that all the litter sticks in.
customer_reviews.author: JVasinko

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to go under my dogs crate bcuz one of my male dogs pees on the side of it, ruining my wood floor. It’s great. It’s larger than I thought but better too big than too small. With the pattern it actually just looks like a rug so it’s better since it’s in the living room. Easy to clean, just spray with a hose. I’d definitely recommend this product. Came immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa B

customer_reviews.title: Liquid leaks through on to the floor
customer_reviews.text: Liquid leaks right through these on to the floor. It hides under there until you pick the mat up an look under it. They do catch litter pretty well, but when liquid (like cat urine) goes right through them, they don't protect your floor. If your cat NEVER pees outside the box, these are fine, otherwise, avoid them.
customer_reviews.author: R on west coast

customer_reviews.title: This mat is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE how large this mat it! I love that it come in different colors too. I have hardwood floors and the usual, grey mats stuck out like a sore thumb. They brown blends in perfectly! The mat did have a funky odor when I first unwrapped it two days ago but it's pretty much dissipated now. I will be purchasing more of these to go under my other litter boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mann

customer_reviews.title: Gotta catch it all!
customer_reviews.text: This mat works really well. My cats don't like standing on it (which is good) because now they leave each other alone when using the cat...dome. it's big enough that when they spring out it catches the litter they fling behind them.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Litter mat for my kitties...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this mat, and it appears to catch quite a bit of the litter. Of course, nothing is 100% effective, and I have been using the larger grain litter. I'm going to try the smaller sand to see if it catches more of the litter on my cats' paws. I need to probably wash it sooner than later since one of my cats is a non-box pooper, so I will see how easy that is when it's time. One last comment: I prefer the material this one is made from since my cats scratched the "rubbery" ones to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Cateye36Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very large
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find this on Amazon. It is very big which I need for my 2 litter boxes. It definitely traps litter. The only negative I can see is that it sometimes traps it TOO well and can be hard to shake out. It has a lifetime warranty if you register it so not sure how you can go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping, Mat is “ok” at best
customer_reviews.text: I was excited because of other reviews and hoped this would do better than the rubber mat I got at Walmart. It has not contained litter any better than using the rubber mat or a towel to be honest. I still have to vaccum my carpets twice a day because of the mess. I use fresh step clumping litter FYI, not anything weird
customer_reviews.author: MsBird

customer_reviews.title: Great Mats
customer_reviews.text: I love the litter box mat. I have seven inside cats and the texture, quality and durability of these litter box mats are perfect. I have the extra large one for two litter boxes in my basement and the mat catches all the litter from paws or just normal pawing of litter. Very durable and attractive as I have three mats in the main part of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Traps litter but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the mat and the fact that it really traps the litter. The only fault is that it is really difficult to clean litter off of it. I have to either move the two boxes off and take it outside and shake it or pull out the vacuum cleaner to suck it up. It would be easier to just sweep it up but I guess then it wouldn't trap it!
customer_reviews.author: m2185

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean-up for litter box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-cat household because we have had problems with our cats stepping out of the litter box and bringing litter with them. The mats help catch the litter from their paws and keep everything in one spot rather than scattered around the house. They're easy to clean and make my life much easier and cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Think about your needs before you make this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I believe my expectations were that the litter would not be spread. I did not take into consideration that the rubber surface would also hold moisture UNDERNEATH and could cause problems on hardwood. I would recommend a large piece of old carpet instead and just vacuum that sucker whenever it became covered with tracked litter. I am actually sending this back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! No more stepping on litter pieces everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat kicks litter everywhere to the point that it's all over our upstairs hallway and even going down our stairs. It drives me crazy to walk into our laundry room and step on little litter pellets! This mat seems to have reduced the spread dramatically. I still have to sweep of course but it is nowhere near as bad as it was before I purchased this. We were previously using a mat I found at Target that was much smaller and stiff with squiggly lines. The lines were to wide to really catch anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep the sand on the mat no elsewhere !
customer_reviews.text: I am happy i bought this wonderful large mat for my old cat. i don't have to swipe all the messy sand spreaded by his paws all over the room now, it stays on this mat. It's wonderful and very cushy - i will recommend this to a friend !
customer_reviews.author: Michele Whiteaker

customer_reviews.title: Great service, arrived quickly and on time
customer_reviews.text: Great service, arrived quickly and on time. It is large and exactly what I expected. However, it does not collect all the dirt. My picky can didn’t like the feel of it and was jumping from the cat litter box over the carpet. So dirt was still getting around it. Is this a deal breaker, absolutely not. It is keeping the dirt much more contained, however cat litter does spread. Would I buy it again, definitely. As, it is keeping most of the litter contained and does vacuum up well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your house clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping litter from being tracked all over the place. I have 5 cats/kittens and keeping my house clean is hard. It's the perfect size for the area I needed it in too as I have a extra large litter pan there. My only issue is it's not easy to clean the pee off it (I have a 5yr old cat that has a bad leg so he can't squat down as low to pee and sometimes it goes over the side). It needs to be taken outside, hosed down and air dried before putting back in use. Other than that, it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Longidus

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful for cats and cat lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I have this in front of my cats’ litter box and it looks great and protects the carpet underneath. I wish I had seen these sooner! It truly protects the carpet underneath and it looks quite nice and not tacky! It is such a great idea and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Darla J. Keefer

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Litter spread is greatly reduced compared to past mats. It is weighty but not so much that I cannot shake it out. I have arthritis. The cats were unsure of it's plastic odor at first but after a few hours were okay with it. Thanks for a great mat! Wf
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: It covers a good majority of my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This mat is HUGE. I got it to attempt to control the scatter of litter that my fat cat always loves to bring with him when he jumps out of the box. It covers a good majority of my laundry room, which I wasn't expecting, but was pleasantly surprised it did! Got here amazingly fast and no complaints whatsoever about the quality of this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: No longer a skeptic
customer_reviews.text: I used to clean up litter pellets all over the house that my 2 cats would track everywhere. Now I almost never find any litter except on the litter mat. It's a wonderful product. Now Easyology needs to come up with an equally successful method to keep cats from shedding hair all over the house and I will be in cat-owner heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Little through out house
customer_reviews.text: I have bought small cat mats that worked great! But this extra large mat for what ever reason is absolutely aweful! It tracks little through out my home and I had to remove it after a month because I constantly found myself vacuuming and sanitizing and Bono moping every day! 🤨
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: So far I am pleased
customer_reviews.text: This litter mat seems to be doing a good job keeping the litter contained. I have a cat who is especially fond of throwing the litter around the box. I was getting tired of constantly stepping on the litter, which would scatter all over my tile floor. I’m not finding as many scattered litter pieces anymore. My older cat seems to like the mat texture. It seems relatively soft to the touch. I bought the jumbo size because I needed the space to put down 2 boxes for my 2 cats. This is a huge mat. Please make sure you measure your desired area first. It works fine for my area, but just be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: This REALLY gets the litter off little paws
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing how much of the litter gets left on this mat and not dragged around our home. I had not realized how much actually was NOT being left behind on other mats. The cats do not try to jump past it either, so we assume it is not too uncomfortable to walk on.
customer_reviews.author: Strumpet101

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love less litter on the floor??
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard wood floor, yes I had a carpet under the litter box but it didn't catch the litter the way this does. I have a hand vac and wow it just picks it up great. When I do my full cleaning, the vacuum works great as well. I have a kitty that for some reason at times likes to hang his behind over the edge of the litter box (go figure) Never a problem sponging it off, never seeped under the mat. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: No more stray litter!
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floors and the litter would always find its way onto them and then would get kicked around the entire apartment until I could sweep or vaccuum. These massive mats changed that. Nearly every single piece is kept contained on the mats and makes cleanup easy with my vaccuum. I had smaller versions of this before that were good, but this size really works so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Also great for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I only have dogs, little toy poodle and corgi pup. They always bring debris back inside the house. The size is perfect to put behind the front door. The material is soft to human feet and pet paws. I love the decorative pattern of the mat, matching with our home decor.
customer_reviews.author: Penneney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It catches most of the litter. although it does do better when the pieces are chips (like Arm& Hammer) rather than balls (like Tidy Cats). The litter does really get down in the weave and, as far as I can tell, is impossible to get out. I could have sworn I ordered the beige color since I figured that would be the case, but I was sent the dark gray. Not the end of the world, but it does make all the trapped litter pretty obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: They toss it on the floor and then walk through it tracking it for great distances. Ha
customer_reviews.text: Okay, we have cats who think their mission in life is to toss cat litter on the floor just for me to get exercise by having to sweep it up and bend over and use the dustpan. They toss it on the floor and then walk through it tracking it for great distances. Ha! I have foiled their evil plan by purchasing this mat. Whatever this mat is made up seems to grab the litter and not let go. So instead of having to follow my cats around cleaning up after them....I only have to clean off the mat! HaHaHa
customer_reviews.author: Velcro

customer_reviews.title: Traps most of the litter
customer_reviews.text: Traps most of the litter and looks fine. We have the litter box is in the niche of a living room. It is concealed, but part of the litter mat is showing. It looks fine, the color of the mat blending with the floor color.
customer_reviews.author: Anya P

customer_reviews.title: Cuts down on tracking litter through the house.
customer_reviews.text: Just put the mat down yesterday. So far it's doing the job fine. I have one who leaps out of the box scattering litter. And one who scratches all around the box and tracks with her furry feet. So far the mat is cutting down on the tracking through the house. Will see how it is for cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: I have a very fluffy cat and he loves to jump out of the littler box and take it everywhere through the house with him. These mats have greatly reduced that. I bought 2 of them because I don’t think one is big enough although these were the biggest ones I could find. I would say about 75% less litter is tracked throughout the house now. So glad I found these. Easy to shake out too!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ... had this about a week but so far so good. My kitten likes yonmake a giant mess with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this about a week but so far so good. My kitten likes yonmake a giant mess with the litter and it was getting into my super thick carpet. I use another little mat (smaller) just outside the box opening so I can dump most of the litter back in, but this bigger mat is keeping the what makes it past that mat out of my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The mat is a great size. I bought two to line up to cover three XL litter boxes. As others have said, the mat does have a plastic smell. I also found that the sicker on the underside ripped the rubber of the mat open when I tried to remove it so that area of the mat is compromised now. Be very careful when removing the stickers!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I like these. They really trap the litter BUT they ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They really trap the litter BUT they don’t clean as easily as they claim unless you have a super sucker of a vacuum. I have to vac the litter up and then take them outside and shake out what the vacuum didn’t suck up. And still some residual litter is stuck in the mat. Small hassle for the mat being such a great litter catcher. It is definitely doing what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: betsy

product_meta.title: Jumbo Litter Mat 47" x 36" Cat Litter Mat - Traps Messes, Easy Clean, Durable, Phthalate Free, Litter Box Mat with Scatter Control - Soft on Kitty Paws
feature_bullets: CAPTURES MORE LITTER.. Features deep grooves and quality mesh to capture litter better than other mats on the market. This is the largest size (47" x 36’’) litter mat on the market which means less sweeping around the cat box.

PHTHALATE FREE, DURABLE AND SOFT.. Extra thick and extra large PVC material that won’t tear like other mats out there. The unique patented design traps up to 37% more litter than other mats. Our premium kitty litter mat is phthalate free and the super soft material is gentle on your cats sensitive paws.
SLIP-RESISTANT.. Slip-resistant backing keeps your cat litter mat in place. That means the litter mess stays in the mat, not on your floors.

EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTAIN.. Lightweight (5 lb) water resistant plastic material is super easy to clean. Simply shake off, vacuum, or soap up and rinse down. Your mat will be good as new. For sanitary reasons, do not clean mat in the kitchen sink.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
